name: dejizo-json-wrapper
description: A JSON wrapper for the Dejizo web service.

scripts.build-web-broken: browserify web/module.js -i cls-bluebird -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-es2015-modules-commonjs transform-async-to-generator ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > web/bundle.min.js
scripts.build-web: browserify web/module.js -i cls-bluebird -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-es2015-modules-commonjs transform-async-to-generator ] ] > web/bundle.min.js

author: Raffaele Procentese <deadpikasso@gmail.com>
